displayName.text: Accredited Gemological Institute, AGI New York

formattedAddress: 37 W 47th St Suite 503, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 37 W 47th St Suite 503, New York, NY 10036-2809, USA

originalText.text: This is a scam! Yes the ring I got was nice and I love it more than anything because my fiance means the world to me but he wanted to find out if he actually got a deal, I took the ring to a local jeweler that I know personally and found out the diamond was only worth a third of what he paid. Apparently they enhanced the diamonds and make them look nicer then they are and over charge you, while they tell you that you got a deal. Smh stay away. Anyone one telling you they had a great experience is probably lying or being paid to say so ! Just be careful

originalText.text: Very knowledgeable staff. The staff explained every step of the process before we started. They were very friendly, and even helped me get my money back by evaluating a diamond I bought from a jeweler to be lower quality than it was sold for. I was able to get my money back and all was well.  Highly recommended!

originalText.text: What a great experience! My fiance purchased my engagement ring with AGI last year and we came back to get my wedding band. Mark worked so well with us helping us find the perfect wedding band! I cant say enough good things. I know all of my jewelry will be purchased with AGI for years to come! Thanks again for such a great quality and service.

Mark worked so well with us helping us find the perfect wedding band! I cant say enough good things. I know all of my jewelry will be purchased with AGI for years to come! Thanks again for such a great quality and service.

originalText.text: where do i even start?  i entered the door totally flustered and upset that i was ripped off by a loose diamond i purchased from a NJ diamond exchange.  They were soooooooo knowledgeable and took their time explaining everything to me and put me at ease.  They explained all the pricing to me (wholesale and retail) and explained the resale process.  They were completely honest and i appreciated it so much - they are extremely trustworthy!  That day I was assisted by Dennis, Angelina and Mark and was so happy to work with pleasant, knowledgeable, honest individuals.  I will go here and strongly recommend others to come here for their appraisels!

originalText.text: I recently purchased a diamond ring and was a little skeptical about the diamond. I needed to know more about it and most importantly if i paid the right amount. I was in need of an independent diamond appraisal Lab. Thankfully I found this diamond Appraisal Lab in NYC through Google search. I sat down with Mark who is a qualified Diamond appraiser. He patiently sat with me for an hour and answered all my questions. more importantly He made sure the diamond I purchased was natural and matched what the retailer had said. We discussed wholesale prices and retail prices and basically left me at ease. I highly recommended this lab for their affordable rates, amazing service, and their knowledge in this complicated industry.
